Pre-Game Insights: India have sent a second-string squad to Zimbabwe for the T20I series and it looks to be a solid one.
The Indian players who had done well in the Indian Premier League 2024 have been given an opportunity to represent their nation.
Zimbabwe have announced a well-balanced squad to face India.
Both sides will be eager to bring out their A-game and start the series on a winning note.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Harare Sports Club is generally a good one to bat on.
Clear skies will greet the two sides on Saturday.
The temperature is expected to range between 12 and 26 degrees Celsius.
India have won six of the eight meetings between the two sides in the shortest format.
Others: The Indian side will be led by Shubman Gill, while Zimbabwe will be led by Sikandar Raza.
